thread.section_title: Munchery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Munchery | www.munchery.com
thread.title: Nancy

author: Nancy
title: Nancy
text: As a retired couple, we have plenty of time to cook healthy dinners and we both enjoy cooking and eating out, but Munchery is great for those nights when you still want to eat a good meal at home but don't have the time or interest to cook. I've tried a few other services and I've used Munchery in Seattle, New York and Los Angeles. The quality, convenience and price is unbeatable. It may take a few tries to find your favorite dish, but what I love is that we can order different dishes and dinner is still ready in just a few minutes.
